title: Probate Training A to Z for Real Estate Professionals
desc: Presented by Attorney & CPA: Paul Horn? The most comprehensive and interactive probate & conservatorship training for REALTORS in Southern California! Discover the least competitive and evergreen niche in real estate. We will cover everything from getting probate leads, understanding probate transactions, to protecting your commission in court.  BONUS:  Attend the seminar and find out how to get ALL the probate leads in Southern California that need REALTORS for ONLY $25 per month without going to the courthouse! Attention! This event is FREE and seats are limited! Please register online EARLY to reserve your seat! ? Paul Horn Has Been Invited to Speak by Many Real Estate Organizations.
